Package org.lujza.quiz

package org.lujza.quiz
The root package of the Quiz Application, containing the main application logic and entry points. This package orchestrates the flow of the quiz, including initializing the application, handling user inputs, and coordinating the quiz process. Subpackages include:
  • org.lujza.quiz.model for the application's data models.
  • org.lujza.quiz.util for utility classes that provide functionalities.
This application aims to provide an interactive and customizable quiz experience, supporting various quiz modes and themes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lujza.quiz.model
    Contains the model classes used by the quiz application, including representations of questions and themes.
    org.lujza.quiz.util
    Provides utility classes and methods for the quiz application, such as file reading and data parsing utilities.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Quiz
    The Quiz class facilitates a quiz application designed to help users prepare for exams by practicing various topics.
